verbose_text: Blocking of IL-4 at the infection site impaired IFNgamma secretion by dLN T cells 7 days later and increased IL-4 secretion by dLN cells 1 week post infection.
evidence: IL-4 at the infection site impaired IFNgamma secretion by dLN T cells 7 days later and increased IL-4 secretion by dLN cells 1 week post
